sentences.sContent: I propose that every time an American bags a snipe, the federal government should pay him or her $100.
sentences.sContent_eng: I propose that every time an American bags a snipe, the federal government should pay him or her $100.
sentences.sCn: 美国需要更多的猎鹬者，我提议一个美国人每捕到一只鹬，联邦政府支付给他100美元。

synos.tran: [军]狙击；[鸟]鹬；香烟屁股；被开玩笑的人物
狙击；[军]伏击；抨击；猎鸟；诽谤
